He is fine with me,My wife had a problem in foot, which results in bone growth, 
taking care for heal in the foot, he gave many tips to care of the growth in bone on foot.also Given injection on foot, that was a severe pain while ingecting, and slowly came down.totally I am satisfied with the treatment given by him, May god bless him always, and give more strength to look and take care of other people.
